name: GRAVITEMPO
description:
Minimalist gravity-controlling rhythm puzzle.

Use the arrow keys to control gravity. All blocks fall at once, on the beat. You can tap the arrow keys in the same direction you're moving, or tap space, to accelerate the blocks.

Like any good Tetris-alike, the game gets faster as you play. There is no win condition, only a "losing less hard" condition. The end screen comes for us all.

Try out Math Rock mode for a real thrill!
